verses.1:
Ny hazo nijalianao,
Ry Jeso Tomponay!
;;;Maneho ny fitiavanao;;;
''' Dia iankinanay'''
Dia iankinanay. (in-2)
verses.3:
Ny avotr'aina vitanao
No itokianao
;;;Ny entanay voaesotrao;;;
"Ka afaka izahay"
Ka afaka izahay. (in-2)
verses.4:
Ny hazo nihomboanao
Dia voninahitray
;;;Ny nanalam-baraka anao;;;
"No isandratanay"
No isandratanay. (in-2)
